plugin.name: mume_misc
plugin.author: Nick Stockton
plugin.purpose: Misc aliases and triggers that don't belong anywhere else.

trigger.match: ^Your bash at (?:a |the )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? sends (?:him|her|it) sprawling\.$
trigger.name: bash_target

trigger.match: ^As (?:a |the )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? avoids your bash\, you topple over and lose your balance\.$
trigger.name: bash_fail_target

trigger.match: ^You dodge a bash from (?:a |the )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? who loses (?:his|her|its) balance\.$
trigger.name: bash_fail_you

trigger.match: Your head stops stinging.
trigger.name: bash_recover_you

trigger.match: ^(?:A |The )?(?P<basher>.+?)(?: \((?P<basher_label>\w+)\))? sends (?:A |The )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? sprawling with a powerful bash\.$
trigger.name: bash_someone
trigger.send: if "%<someone>" == "you" then Note("Bashed by ", "%<basher_label>" ~= "" and "%<basher_label>" or "%<basher>") else Note("%<someone_label>" ~= "" and "%<someone_label>" or "%<someone>", " Bashed by ", "%<basher_label>" ~= "" and "%<basher_label>" or "%<basher>") end

trigger.match: ^(?:A |The )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? avoids being bashed by (?:a |the )?(?P<basher>.+?)(?: \((?P<basher_label>\w+)\))? who loses (?:his|her|its) balance\.$
trigger.name: bash_fail_someone
trigger.send: Note("%<someone_label>" ~= "" and "%<someone_label>" or "%<someone>", " failed Bash from ", "%<basher_label>" ~= "" and "%<basher_label>" or "%<basher>")

trigger.match: ^(?:A |The )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? seems to have recovered (?:his|her|its) senses\.$
trigger.name: bash_recover_someone

trigger.match: A handful of small, silvery bottles and vials.
A mortar and pestle of smooth, white marble.
A sharp-edged shining sickle.
An exquisite retort of polished copper.
A delicate set of translucent glass measuring cups.
A fine slender paring knife and a stout chopping knife.
A round metal sieve with a mesh of golden threads.
Anarwen's grey eyes stop on you, as she ponders something.
trigger.name: auto_quest_anarwen1

trigger.match: ^Anarwen says \'Would you help me\, \w+\?\'$
trigger.name: auto_quest_anarwen2
trigger.send: if anarwen_quest_me then Send("nod anarwen") anarwen_quest_me = false end

trigger.match: An elven scout smiles at you.
trigger.name: auto_quest_elf_camp1

trigger.match: An elven scout says 'chance be headed north, to fair Imladris?'
trigger.name: auto_quest_elf_camp2

trigger.match: An elven scout says 'perhaps bring this letter to our master?'
trigger.name: auto_quest_elf_camp3
trigger.send: if elf_camp_quest_me then Send("nod") elf_camp_quest_me = false end

trigger.match: An elven scout gives you an important-looking letter.
trigger.name: auto_quest_elf_camp4

trigger.match: An elven shepherdess says 'Feel free to speak first, then remind me - I would like to tell you of Nirnaeth Arnoediad.'
trigger.name: auto_quest_mystical1
trigger.send: change language Sindarin say Nirnaeth Arnoediad change language Westron

trigger.match: An elven shepherdess gives you an oaken rod.
trigger.name: auto_quest_mystical2
trigger.send: tell group Auto-tell: Elven shepherdess loaded rod.

trigger.match: An ancient weaver says 'But perhaps you would be willing to help me?'
trigger.name: auto_quest_weaver

trigger.match: A stout dwarf is here mixing dyes.
trigger.name: auto_quest_dye_maker1

trigger.match: A dwarven dye-maker says 'Let me guess, that old biddy who makes those green cloaks sent you looking for her order? Answer to me, didn't she?'
trigger.name: auto_quest_dye_maker2

trigger.match: The rope lands close but does not quite seem to catch the stump.
trigger.name: auto_quest_dye_maker3

trigger.match: Ithildir the Noldo glances at you with a hint of suspicion in his dark eyes.
trigger.name: auto_quest_ithildir1

trigger.match: Ithildir the Noldo says 'Are you seeking safety, adventure, or fighting our common foe?'
trigger.name: auto_quest_ithildir2
trigger.send: if ithildir_quest_me then Send("change language westron") Send("say adventure") end

trigger.match: ^Ithildir the Noldo says \'Please\, \w+\, will you help me\?\'$
trigger.name: auto_quest_ithildir3
trigger.send: if ithildir_quest_me then Send("nod Ithildir") end

trigger.match: Ithildir the Noldo gives you a beryl ring.
trigger.name: auto_quest_ithildir4
trigger.send: if ithildir_quest_me then Send("put beryl e.pack") ithildir_quest_me = false end

trigger.match: Yerik the Sage says 'Come again!'
trigger.name: auto_give_note_yerik
trigger.send: get note e.all give note Yerik

trigger.match: An old man gives you a white folded note.
trigger.name: auto_put_note_pack

trigger.match: The aloof hobbit says 'Maybe you are experienced enough to be the leader on such a perilous journey! Now, what do you say? Great fame and treasures could lie before us!'
trigger.name: auto_quest_harle

trigger.match: Elrond turns his gaze toward you, peering into the very depths of your soul.
trigger.name: auto_quest_elrond1

trigger.match: Elrond says 'Would you be willing to help me with a dangerous task?'
trigger.name: auto_quest_elrond2
trigger.send: if oie_key_quest_me then Send("nod elrond") oie_key_quest_me = false end

trigger.match: Elrond gives you an ancient silver key.
trigger.name: auto_keyring_oie_key

trigger.match: ^Daegil says \'The ferry has arrived in (?:Ha|Fo)rlond\. We hope you enjoyed the ride and we wish you a pleasant day\. Please leave the ferry now\.\'$
trigger.name: auto_leave_ferry_gh

trigger.match: With a grinding noise, the passage to the west closes.
With a grinding noise, the passage to the west opens.
^(?P<player>\w+) slips on the treacherous ground and falls (?P<direction>\w+)\.$
trigger.name: auto_tell_player_fell_gloom

trigger.match: ^The Balrog entangles \w+ in its whip and hurls h(?:im|er) out of the room\!$
trigger.name: auto_yell_fear_balrog

trigger.match: Suddenly, the ground drops beneath your feet!
The earth crumbles away beneath your feet - you slip - you fall!
When you come to, you find yourself lying on a muddy floor, stripped of your gear. An overpowering smell of smoke fills your nostrils.
A gnarled tree stomps the forest floor, producing thunderous vibrations that send you sprawling.
You break the surface and find yourself looking upwards at the twinkling stars above a twilit land.
^You slip on the treacherous ground and fall (?:north|east|south|west|up|down)\, landing on your back\.$
The entire cave system thunders and reverberates as the huge beast drops dead to the ground, making you lose your balance.
sparkling maroon. This gem must then be placed within the inset of an
green colour is cast upon its surroundings when touched by illumination.
blue glow emanates from deep within. This gem must then be placed within the
hardness and rare blue transparency give off a vitreous luster. This gem
red glow seems to capture and absorb all illumination surrounding it. This
^A citizen mercenary (?:\(\w+\) )?(?:snuffs|lights) a lantern\.$
trigger.name: omit_merc_lanterns
auto_move_stakes
trigger.send: if auto_move_stakes then move_stakes(string.strip("%<direction>")) auto_move_stakes = false end

trigger.match: ^Several glyphs have been carved into the oaken rod\. Some symbols are larger and more finely detailed than the others\: a (?P<first>[^\,]+)\, a (?P<second>[^\,]+)\, and a (?P<third>[^\.]+)\.$
trigger.name: auto_open_mystical
trigger.send: if GLYPHS["%<first>"] and GLYPHS["%<second>"] and GLYPHS["%<third>"] then Send("put rod ", GLYPHS["%<first>"]) Send("put rod ", GLYPHS["%<second>"]) Send("put rod ", GLYPHS["%<third>"]) end

trigger.match: ^A (?:great\, dark|horrible\, dark-green) spider quickly begins to weave a tight\, sticky web around your body\!$
trigger.name: bm_spiders1

trigger.match: ^A (?:great\, dark|horrible\, dark-green) spider burdens your movement wrapping you layer after layer\!$
trigger.name: bm_spiders2

trigger.match: ^You stagger for your balance as a (?:great\, dark|horrible\, dark-green) spider wraps the sticky cords faster and faster around you\!$
trigger.name: bm_spiders3

trigger.match: ^After some struggle you remove the last web on you\.$
trigger.name: bm_spiders4

trigger.match: ^(?:There is an old street\-lamp on the border of the street|A finely crafted crystal lamp is here|A finely crafted crystal lamp is hanging from a tree branch)\.$
trigger.name: gag_street_lamps

trigger.match: ^There is (?:a lot of|some) (?:water|snow) on the ground\.$
trigger.name: gag_snow_water_ground

trigger.match: ^The (?:ground|water) is frozen solid\.$
trigger.name: gag_frozen_ground_and_water

trigger.match: ^(?:You quietly scout \w+\.\.|You stop scouting)\.$
trigger.name: gag_scouting_start_stop

trigger.match: ^(?:You grasp the corpse and start dragging it\.|You are already dragging it\!)$
trigger.name: auto_drag_next
trigger.send: if auto_drag then auto_drag_counter = auto_drag_counter + 1 Send(string.format("drag %s.corpse", auto_drag_counter)) else Note("%0") end

trigger.match: ^You do not see anything like that\.$
trigger.name: auto_drag_complete
trigger.send: if auto_drag then Note("Now dragging all corpses.") auto_drag_counter = 1 auto_drag = false else Note("%0") end

trigger.match: ^(?P<player>.+?) joins (?P<tank>.+?)'s fight\.$
trigger.name: shorten_assists

trigger.match: ^(?:A |The )?(?P<someone>.+?)(?: \((?P<someone_label>\w+)\))? leaves (?P<direction>north|east|south|west|up|down)(?: (?P<action>sneaking|riding a (?P<mount>pony|dales-pony|horse|warhorse|pack horse|trained horse|horse of the Rohirrim|brown donkey|mountain mule|hungry warg|brown wolf)(?: \((?P<mount_label>\w+)\))?))?\.$
trigger.name: shorten_leaves_message
trigger.send: local someone = "%<someone>" local direction = "%<direction>" local mount = "%<mount>" if "%<someone_label>" ~= "" then someone = "%<someone_label>" end if "%<mount_label>" ~= "" then mount = "%<mount_label>" elseif mount == "horse" then mount = "docile" elseif mount:startswith("brown") or mount:startswith("mountain") or mount:endswith("Rohirrim") then -- Use the last word of the string. mount = mount:match("%w+$") else -- Use the first word in the string. -- If string is empty, mount will be set to nil. mount = mount:match("^%w+") end Note(string.strip(string.format("%s %s %s", direction, someone, mount and mount or "%<action>")))

trigger.match: ^(?:Last login [1]?\d hour[s]? ago|Is playing) from \*\.(?P<alpha2>[a-z]{2,2})\.$
trigger.name: translate_country_codes
trigger.send: if country_codes["%<alpha2>"] then Note(string.format("%0 (%s)", country_codes["%<alpha2>"])) else Note("%0") end

trigger.match: You have been idle, and are pulled into a void.
trigger.name: no_void

trigger.match: ^ACK\! .+? didn\'t follow you\, you lost (him|her|it)\.$
trigger.name: beep_on_ack

trigger.match: ^(Nah\.\.\. You feel too relaxed to do that\.|Maybe you should get on your feet first\?|You can\'t do this sitting\!|You can\'t concentrate enough while resting\.|Not from your present position\!)$
trigger.name: auto_stand

trigger.match: Prompt set to None.
trigger.name: always_show_prompt

trigger.match: ^(?:Prompt set to All|Your prompt will display twiddlers when you are busy)\.$
trigger.name: keep_twiddlers_off

trigger.match: You can only gain one level at a time... Reduced experience.
trigger.name: beep_on_reduced_xp

trigger.match: ^(Welcome to the land of Middle\-earth\. May your visit here be\.\.\. interesting\.|Reconnecting\.)$
trigger.name: do_stuff_after_login
trigger.send: -- Negotiate echo back on. -- If this is not done, command history in MushClient won't work. SendPkt(string.char(255, 253, 1)) Send("change compact on") Send("change spam off") Send("change brief on") Send("change wordwrap off") Send("change prompt all")

alias.name: get_new_unique_id
alias.send: local new_id = GetUniqueID() SetClipboard(new_id) Note(string.format("%s copied to clipboard.", new_id))

alias.name: spam_recover
alias.send: get all.arrow all.corpse get all.arrow put all.arrow quiver

alias.name: reveal_all
alias.send: reveal all

alias.name: reveal_quick
alias.send: reveal quick

alias.name: reveal_thorough
alias.send: reveal thorough

alias.name: search_thorough
alias.send: search thorough

alias.name: search_quick
alias.send: search quick

alias.name: show_level
alias.send: Send("info %l")

alias.name: drag_all
alias.send: auto_drag = true auto_drag_counter = 1 Send("drag 1.corpse")

alias.name: move_stakes
alias.send: auto_move_stakes = true Send("look star")

alias.name: butcher_corpses
alias.send: Send(string.format("butcher %s.corpse", "%<digit>" ~= "" and "%<digit>" or "1"))

alias.name: money_info
alias.send: info %%r

alias.name: affected_by_info
alias.send: info %%f

alias.name: age_info
alias.send: info %%a years, %%N months, and %%n days old. Played for %%P hours realtime.

alias.name: alignment_info
alias.send: info %%q

alias.name: citizen_list_info
alias.send: info %%c

alias.name: weight_carried_info
alias.send: info %%C, %%F

alias.name: look_in
alias.send: look in %1

alias.name: switch_cloak_from_pouch
alias.send: remove cloak remove mantle remove fur get cloak pouch wear cloak put cloak pouch put mantle pouch put fur pouch

alias.name: switch_mantle_from_pouch
alias.send: remove cloak remove mantle remove fur get mantle pouch wear mantle put cloak pouch put mantle pouch put fur pouch

alias.name: switch_fur_from_pack
alias.send: remove cloak remove mantle remove fur get fur e.pack wear fur put cloak e.pack put mantle e.pack put fur e.pack

alias.name: switch_fur_from_pouch
alias.send: remove cloak remove mantle remove fur get fur pouch wear fur put cloak pouch put mantle pouch put fur pouch

alias.name: wake_stand
alias.send: wake stand

alias.name: Switch_cloak_from_pack
alias.send: remove cloak remove mantle remove fur get cloak e.pack wear cloak put cloak e.pack put mantle e.pack put fur e.pack

alias.name: Switch_mantle_from_pack
alias.send: remove cloak remove mantle remove fur get mantle e.pack wear mantle put mantle e.pack put cloak e.pack put fur e.pack

alias.name: switch_boots_from_pouch
alias.send: remove boots get boots pouch wear boots put boots pouch

alias.name: switch_boots_from_pack
alias.send: remove boots get boots e.pack wear boots put boots e.pack

alias.name: switch_belt_from_pack
alias.send: remove belt get belt e.pack wear belt wear ruby put belt e.pack wear all

alias.name: use_str_ring
alias.send: remove ring get topaz-ring e.pack wear topaz-ring use ring remove topaz-ring put topaz-ring e.pack wear ring

alias.name: use_cc_ring
alias.send: remove ring get garnet-ring e.pack wear garnet-ring use ring remove garnet-ring put garnet-ring e.pack wear ring

alias.name: use_pipe
alias.send: get pipe e.pack wield pipe rest smoke pipe stand remove pipe put pipe e.pack

alias.name: drink_goblet
alias.send: get goblet e.pack drink goblet put goblet e.pack

alias.name: pour_water_goblet
alias.send: get goblet e.pack pour water goblet put goblet e.pack

alias.name: use_pbs
alias.send: Send("get bluestone all") Send("wield bluestone") Send(string.format("use bluestone %s", "%<player>")) Send("remove bluestone") Send("put bluestone e.pack")

alias.name: water_bag
alias.send: get cup elven drink cup put cup elven

alias.name: food_bag
alias.send: get wafer elven eat wafer

alias.name: rope_bag
alias.send: get rope elven

alias.name: knife_bag
alias.send: get knife elven

muclient.script:
require("mystdlib") json = require("dkjson") TTS = "925cdd0331023d9f0b8f05a7" COUNTRY_CODES_FILE = string.format("%sdatabases\\country_codes.json", GetInfo(67))
if os.isFile(COUNTRY_CODES_FILE) then fileObj = io.open(COUNTRY_CODES_FILE, "rb") country_codes = json.decode(fileObj:read("*all"), 1, nil) fileObj:close() else country_codes = {} end
GLYPHS = { ["sprig of mistletoe"] = "wedding", ["tree"] = "hunt", ["flame"] = "battle", ["cloud"] = "river", ["star"] = "mountain", ["harp"] = "feast", ["crown"] = "funeral" }
auto_move_stakes = false auto_drag = false auto_drag_counter = 1 elf_camp_quest_me = false oie_key_quest_me = false anarwen_quest_me = false ithildir_quest_me = false
function move_stakes(direction) local directions = {"N", "E", "SE", "SW", "W"} local offset = table.index(directions, direction) if not offset then Note(string.format("Error: invalid direction '%s'.", direction)) return end local stakes = {"Forostar", "Orrostar", "Hyarrostar", "Hyarnustar", "Andustar"} -- Mittalmar is always in the center. Send("move Mittalmar centre") for i, stake in ipairs(stakes) do local oriented = (i - offset) % table.getn(directions) + 1 Send(string.format("move %s %s", stake, directions[oriented])) end end
function OnPluginConnect() DoCommand("FullScreenMode") end
